thread.title: Very reasonable. A little tired but great value, great location
thread.title_full: Very reasonable. A little tired but great value, great location - Review of The Court - A St Giles Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BiddyNZ
title: Very reasonable. A little tired but great value, great location
text:
Surrounded by a collection of diners and restaurants, easy walking distance to the UN or Grand Central Station, and your room may well have a great view of either the Chrysler Building or the Empire State Building.
Staff are friendly and really helpful, rooms are a good size, clean. Rooms are noisy - but only from outside. New York drivers use their horn!!! I didn't hear other guests even once.
My only complaint would be the strong smell if the cleaners that are used some days - but the windows open (!) so you can air your room out.
Rooms have a bath. The well stocked minibar tops off a pretty good room.
Room Tip: Get the Chrysler Building view! See more room tips
